Procedure
=========

The Procedure class is a fundamental class within the **pympistandard** package. It allows a user to access any language independent information about a specific MPI procedure. In addition it provides the express property to access the language specific expression of a MPI procedure.

All Procedure objects are listed in :doc: `PROCEDURES <procedures>`.

.. autoclass:: pympistandard.procedure.Procedure

The ISO C expression is described:

.. autoclass:: pympistandard.isoc.ISOCProcedure

.. autoclass:: pympistandard.isoc.EmbiggenedISOCProcedure
